definition: to report (to the authorities)/to declare (to customs)
old name for Shanghai 上海[Shang4 hai3]/surname Shen
to extend/to state/to explain/9th earthly branch: 3-5 p.m., 7th solar month (7th August-7th September), year of the Monkey/ancient Chinese compass point: 240°

sentences.english: (I'll also be taking the output from this model to protest my property-tax assessment).
sentences.chinese: 我還需要拿此模型的輸出申報財產稅。

sentences.english: Verifying the comprehensiveness and timeliness of the data in foreign-related revenue and expenditure declaration.
sentences.chinese: 覈查涉外收支申報數據全面性和及時性。

sentences.english: Is it beneficial to declare PHP anonymous functions outside a loop?
sentences.chinese: 它是有益的申報PHP匿名函數外循環？

sentences.english: E-files of the application book shall also be provided.
sentences.chinese: 申報書應提供電子文檔。

sentences.english: These tax forms are driving me nuts .
sentences.chinese: 填這些納稅申報表快讓我發瘋了。

For some students, having an undeclared major is appropriate for them.
sentences.chinese: 對一些學生來說他們願意選擇一個沒被申報的專業。

sentences.english: We've filed a joint-income tax return.
sentences.chinese: 我們就共同的收入申報了納稅單。

sentences.english: The task force was set up to recover undeclared duties, amounting to hundreds of millions of ringgit.
sentences.chinese: 該工作隊成立了恢復未申報的義務，數以億萬令吉。

sentences.english: Date and reference number of the FSC approval or effective registration of offering and sale;
sentences.chinese: 經本會覈准或申報生效募集及銷售之日期及文號。

sentences.english: However, this requirement shall not apply to transfers totaling less than 10,000 shares per exchange day.
sentences.chinese: 但每一交易日轉讓股數未超過一萬股者，免予申報。

sentences.english: Please fill the baggage declaration form.
sentences.chinese: 請填好行李這張行李申報單。

sentences.english: Article 9 The motor vehicle and vessel tax shall be paid annually.
sentences.chinese: 第九條車船稅按年申報繳納。

sentences.english: Performance was much stronger during the latter half of the six-month reporting period.
sentences.chinese: 更強的性能在下半年的申報期內六個月。

sentences.english: Certain media have suggested the implementation of a property declaration system.
sentences.chinese: 某些媒體已經建議施行一個財產申報體系。

sentences.english: I have a few things to declare.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些東西需要申報。
